notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Funds were provided by the Global Forum on Bioethics in Research (GFBR). GFBR funding is provided by the Wellcome Trust, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation [OPP1151904], the National Institutes of Health, and the UK Medical Research Council. The GFBR and its funders had no role in the conception of the research or in writing the manuscripts.
